thread.title: Kiwis plan overseas travel further ahead than other nationalities
thread.title_full: Kiwis plan overseas travel further ahead than other nationalities

title: Kiwis plan overseas travel further ahead than other nationalities
text:
Kiwis plan overseas travel further ahead than other nationalities Last updated 08:52, September 25 2015 123rf 
Kiwis plan their travel further in advance than anyone else in the world. 
Kiwis plan their travel further in advance than anyone else in the world, new data shows. 
Given how far New Zealanders have to travel, and how much we have to pay to get anywhere, it is probably not surprising that we like to make sure we are getting the right deal at the right time. 
The information comes from global travel search engine Skyscanner , and is based on millions of internet searches. 
Kiwis think long and hard about their travel plans. Image: Shane Wenzlick/FAIRFAX 
The data collected shows Kiwis search for flights around 84 days or 12 weeks before their departure, almost a month earlier than the 59-day average of the other 16 countries included in the data. 
It is also a week earlier than Australians, 16 days earlier than the British and 28 days earlier than Americans. 
The Chinese do the least planning, with an average of just five weeks.
